name: Hootsuite
description: Integrate with Hootsuite to list, schedule, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Profiles
tools.description: List social media profiles connected to your Hootsuite account. Returns service types, usernames, and profile IDs.

tools.name: Schedule Message
tools.description: Schedule a social media message via Hootsuite. Posts to one or more social profiles at a specified time.

tools.name: List Messages
tools.description: List scheduled messages from Hootsuite. Optionally filter by state or date range.

tools.name: Get Analytics
tools.description: Get social media analytics from Hootsuite for a specific profile. Returns engagement metrics like followers, posts, and interactions.

tools.name: List Streams
tools.description: List content streams configured in Hootsuite. Streams are feeds of social content (mentions, timelines, searches, etc.).
